name: hm06
effect: Teaches Rock Smash to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Dive to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Rock Smash Gen II: Whirlpool)

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A rock-crushingly tough attack that may lower DEFENSE.
flavor_text.emerald: A rock-crushingly tough attack that may lower DEFENSE.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: An attack that may also cut DEFENSE. It can also smash cracked boulders.
